=== Current Issues ===

=== System Info ===
'''FlorianPurucker:'''

Dell Inc.
Latitude D630
(System-Version not specified)
----
* Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo T7300 (2 GHz 4 MB L2 cache 800 MHz FSB)
* Chipset : Intel Mobile PM965/GM965/GL960
* Southbridge : 82801H (ICH8-M)
* Memory : DDR2-SDRAM PC5300 - 2x1024 MB
* Audio : Intel HD Audio
* NIC : Broadcom NetXtreme BCM5755M Gigabit Ethernet PCI Express
* WiFi : Intel PRO/Wireless 4965 AGN Network Connection
* Video : Intel GMA X3100
* Display : 1440x900
* Screen : 14.1" LCD
----
This system has been tested with the 32-bit-version of Gutsy Gibbon as well as with the 64-bit-version. They both behave almost identically, except the 64-bit-version returns from hibernate about 25% faster (much to my surprise).

'''GarrettW:'''
Mostly the same, differences below:
* Video: nVidia Quadro NVS-135m

'''ChristianPietsch:'''
The same as in the list above except:
* Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo T7500 (2.2 GHz 4 MB L2 cache 800 MHz FSB)
* Memory: 4 GB RAM

'''SnappyCrunch:'''
Same as FlorianPurucker except:
* Video: nVidia Quadro NVS-135m
* Wifi: Dell Wireless 1390 (Broadcom BCM4311 chipset)
